|stock_os=Linux;2.4.29; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:14:BF |oui_eth=00:14:BF |default_ch= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Broadband Router with RangeBooster}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54GR}} OEM Gemtek WRTR-136C (WRTR-136C_V02) WRT54GR v1.x serial numbers appear to start with '''MK9'''. ==Additional external links== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=16563 On the '''OpenWrt''' Forums] ==Images== File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 angled.jpg|angled File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 front side.jpg|front side File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 opp label side.jpg|left side File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 label side.jpg|right (label) side) File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 top label.jpg|top label File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 bottom label.jpg|bottom label File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 back side.jpg|back side [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 board top.jpg|board top File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 CPU.jpg|CPU File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 Flash.jpg|Flash File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 RAM.jpg|RAM File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 Switch.jpg|Switch File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 headers.jpg|headers File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 board ID.jpg|Gemtek board P/N File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Linksys WRT54GR v1p0 RT2661.jpg|RT2661 [[Has images::internal| ]] ==Serial== ===Pinout===
